stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever you pass host ice, you may gain click. If this is not the first time you gained click during a run this turn, add this program to your grip.
text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Whenever you pass host ice, you may gain [click]. If this is not the first time you gained [click] during a run this turn, add this program to your grip.
title: Pichação
